title: Riot Butcher's Bridge was in 2015...
body: Why haven't you even attempted to bring it back in some way like... at all.

replies.body: Because there's no legendary pirate skins Riot wants to advertise yet

Pirate Annie, Teemo, and Ahri skins inc!

To be honest I like/miss that mode too. I'm sure there's some murdery thing we can bring it back with in the future. Here's hoping!
During the next Harrowing, the Black Mist invades Bilgewater again and you must defend against its horrors atop of the Butcher's Bridge.

If I remember, Butcher's Bridge is difficult to bring back because it uses different tech from Howling Abyss: has a team tried to bridge (/pun) the gap between the two? I feel it would be a nice extra layer if the map selection on ARAM were also random, so you could have just as much of a chance of finding yourself in Bilgewater or the Freljord. As a bonus, you could also add a tiny, tiny chance of getting the Proving Grounds.

I've been wanting random aram maps ever since Butcher's Bridge. Or at least an update to the current one, I REALLLY HATE that its so bleh and ice, and bleh, and ice, and ice... and ice... like who the f*** thought it would be cool to stare at a colorless landscape for almost 9 years now....
Talk Like a Pirate Day IS a US National Holiday. Just saying...
Oh, an Ahri skin? Such a... rare... occurrence.

Hi, what happened to black market brawlers? i searched for hours and couldn't find any official explanation to as why that game mode was never brought back
battle market brawlers (or w/e the minion one was)

I remember reading that the reason it hasn't come back is because it wasn't just a skin, it was a completely rebuilt map of it's own.  Any chance anyone over there has looked into updating the Howling Abyss to make it skin compatible for a rebuilt Butchers Bridge?  I know map skins would be pretty darn popular, but I don't know if anyone at Riot feels it's worth the time.

is it wrong that i think we you just gave legit spoilers on upcoming skin.
 its so horrible to believe that no believe it to be true yet it is true.....
mf is a pirate
that's really fascinating

Because they can't. They already addressed this. Basically it boils down to the fact that the method they used to make Butcher's Bridge would require them to literally remake it, if they wanted to bring it back.  Except doing so will take away from other things, so its not going to happen.
Every time I see 'bring back this' or 'change that' they always blame it on their tech. It literally sounds like Riot has the worst technology ever.
They aren't blaming it on the tech, its just the method they used at the time would require them to make the map again.  It is literally an opportunity cost scenario.

So you're telling me they made the map from scratch, but made it in a way so that the map couldn't be saved for further use? Horrible planning if you ask me. That's something I would expect out of an indie developer, not a multi-billion dollar company like Riot.

You have to remember it's a really old game based on code from a group of mod makers and not official developers, hence all the spaghetti memes. It's entirely possible the base from which they work from doesn't allow that. Riot had to remake all the rotating game modes for the new client, after all.

I think I remember a previous Rioter stating that they've updated the way the map assets work in the coding since the Butcher's Bridge event and that they can't just plug that "skin" back in because it's not a skin, it's a whole ground up map, and they would have to update the assets and code to make it work within the current landscape of the way the game processes information. Not sure if this was a legit excuse but seeing as how it's never returned there must be some truth to it~

Also I feel like rotating game modes in general have just disappeared (compared to last year). And the modes people actually like are few and far between. We only got ARURF this past weekend 'cause they flubbed up Clash. :/

I'm not sure, but i'd guess it'd have to have an event to justify it's return and it was said in one of the Ask Riots (i believe) that the Burning Tides was an interregionally intense event for Riot that was on a larger scale than anything ever before.

I know the map could just re-appear but i'd also like an event with it, personally.
